name: Herzblatt
description:
Recommended browser: Mozilla Firefox, Safari

Find your Herzblatt in this creative dating simulator based on the TV show popular in the '90. Pick a character and display your manners and foolishness (or lack thereof) to win the Picker's heart but be careful, they might have a peculiar taste.

The game includes...

4 fully voiced NPCs with multiple lines each and a special guest star announcer
a unique story of over 800 words
a season appropriate Christmas theme
assets made specifically for the Game Jam
a dramatic break of the 4th wall
multiple art styles

Only one candidate can win this Battle Royale of the Heart. Let it be you or you might just spontaneously combust.
